encode.name: Encode/Decode
encode.desc: Supports common encoding operations such as Base64 and URL encoding/decoding

encrypt.name: Encrypt/Decrypt
encrypt.desc: Supports symmetric encryption (AES/DES) and asymmetric encryption (RSA) operations

time.name: Time Conversion
time.desc: Supports conversion between Unix timestamps and human-readable time

short.name: Short Link Generation
short.desc: Converts long URLs into short links, supporting custom domains

qr.name: QR Code Generation
qr.desc: Generates QR codes for text, links, and other content

jsonPath.name: JsonPath
jsonPath.desc: Parses JSON data and supports JsonPath queries and validation

random.name: Random Generation
random.desc: Generates random strings of specified lengths, supporting letters, numbers, and symbols

image.name: Image Format Conversion
image.desc: Supports converting between image formats (e.g., PNG to JPG) and image compression

color.name: Color Conversion
color.desc: Supports conversions between RGB, HEX, HSL, and other color modes
